phrases: No matter what happens, I am on your side!
No, it is not about me.
There is nothing you want to discuss?
I do not have any friends.
I am not in anyone's field of vision.
I am a professional at that.
After all, I have been eating lunch by myself for over 11 years.
In a family that is helped you out a lot, huh?
First of all, it is a shame about that other girl who switched schools.
I think she was really lucky to have someone like Hina.
Otherwise, it could have had a sadder ending.
Now, it is actually really important that Hina was able to talk to her family about it.
The worst thing anyone could do is not talk about it, and keep it bottled up.
Not talk to their family or their teacher...
But when it came to her friend, Chiho, she told her homeroom teacher about it.
But she got brushed off, apparently.
The teacher said she was misreading the situation.
So she is that type of homeroom teacher, huh?
She got stuck with one of those.
She was probably desperate when she asked for advice, too.
I can get the teacher's perspective,
but that is no time to be running away!
So I thought I would ask your opinion to get the school's perspective.
I thought you could give me a hint on how to handle this.
If you do a search on bullying, you will get 89,100,000 hits.
Do a search for bullying countermeasures, and you get 2,200,000 hits.
And nowhere in here is a solution that will work 100 of the time.
Take a look at this homepage.
People who are doing the bullying.
People who were bullied in the past.
People who were bullies in the past.
That teacher could scroll through 200 million pages
from several years and encounter a mess of muddled arguments.
The thing is, there are thousands of sites like this.
But you will not find an answer in any of them.
I mean, there is a distinct answer for every one of these people here.
People who want to defend themselves.
Parents who want to avenge their children.
Parents who want to clear their children's names.
People who want their bullies to get the same treatment.
People who want to return to their circle of friends.
The configurations of the positions and personalities of people involved are all different.
That is why there is no perfect answer that can work for every case.
But that does not mean you should give up.
If you think, there is no answer to be found so I will do nothing,
But at least we have come to know what not to do.
And that is to stir everyone up with cries of We have to solve this,
while ignoring the victim's feelings, and moving ahead too fast.
I say your daughter is the one who is lying!
My kid said she did not do it!
She is tormented the hell out of my daughter!
Um, I have distributed surveys throughout the school about whether bullying is going on.
- There is no need for that! - You are going to pay for this.
If the victim does not want to make a big deal out of it, or even get more people involved,
then it is wrong for the families to cause a commotion at school, even if it solves the problem.
I heard she was bullied during second year.
Because even if the bullying died down, if they feel out of place there,
then it was all for naught.
So the important thing is to ask Hina about what kind of solution she is hoping for.
It is okay if this takes time,
so be sure to listen patiently to all of her feelings on the matter.
But actually, what is surprisingly effective is being able to say Stop it
when the bully does something to them right then and there.
That all rides on whether she is the type of person who can say that or not.
She is really energetic, with a loud voice...
She laughs a lot, and gets angry or dejected easily.
You could say she is relatively complex.
And for someone who is so cheerful, she does not have much confidence in herself.
But she is strong at heart.
Kiriyama's been watching her closely, huh?
Oh, I am just asking for data purposes...
Um, so, in what way is she cute?
Uh, she has big eyes, small, thin arms and legs, long, glossy hair...
And then there is this, to confirm, just in case...
She is very important to me.
I intend to do anything I can for her.
Diving into the atmosphere of adolescence!!
If she is in trouble, I want to do anything I can to help.
After all, she is my lifesaver.
I have an obligation to pay her back.
That is my duty as a human being.
Kind of has a bad feeling about this
Sorry, I got carried away there.
I was thrilled to see a new side of you, Kiriyama...
It is a bracket for a shogi tournament, right?
And maybe all of these scrawled numbers are...
No, but since I was making a proposal, and if I did not hold it down to realistic figures,
it would just be irresponsible lip service.
I have a debt to repay, so I just cannot be dreaming all day.
I cannot afford to lose any matches.
Is that what you said without any hesitation?
Oh, it is about time for my workshop.
Thank you very much for your advice.
It is given me food for thought.
I would appreciate it if we could talk again about this.
This kid is just off about something!
That is what the teacher's heart was yelling out.
I have to put my life as a teacher on the line and do something!
Before Kiriyama takes those documents to her house and makes a speech!
Otherwise he is going to lose her!
Rei Kiriyama, 5th dan, 18 years old, with calculator in hand, will intervene
in the life of that girl to whom he owes a debt.
What am I going to do?!
Would Hayashida, his homeroom teacher from last year,
be able to stop him from running amok?
Stay tuned and you will find out.
I have never seen him this frustrated after losing before!
Does he finally have the motivation?!
Has he come around to the idea of burning together
in the surging flames of passion?!
One more win and I would have gone to the semifinals, where the pay gets doubled!
Were you just talking big about the debt repayment, Rei Kiriyama?!
If something happens and she ends up going to another school,
or she stops going and has to rely on private tutors,
or consults with a lawyer, all of these things take money!
Whatever happens to Hina, it is my job to prepare a place for her to go!
I am happy for you, Nikaidou!
Wherever there is a board and pieces, that is our battlefield, Kiriyama!
Ten matches with a 30-minute time limit per move.
I cannot lose at the next Kishousen Tournament.
MONEY DEBT MONEY MONEY SHOGI MONEY
In fact, I cannot lose a single match!
BEST FRIENDS BEST FRIENDS BEST FRIENDS SHOGI BEST FRIENDS
Kiriyama, those words are music to my ears!
But that does not mean I can give up!
That is how it is been up to now, and, of course, that is how it will always be.
But right now, I am doing it for Hina!
That Sunday, I got a text from Akari.
They had so many special sales to celebrate their remodeling.
I mean, just 200 yen for a box of potatoes or onions.
I could not pass that up, right?
And then there was 100 grams of chicken thigh for 48 yen,
99 yen for a tub of margarine,
99 yen for a carton of milk...
She is at the amusement park in Asakusa with Grandpa and Momo.
She is still feeling a little down.
I hope this will help her to feel better.
Hey, Kiriyama, are you okay with those?
Are you sure they are not too heavy?
I am a guy, after all.
Rei does not seem to be getting fluffy at all.
How many kilos are you now?
Well, I will be on my way...
Oh, but I am always intruding...
And it kind of seems like you are angry...
What are you going on about?
You intend to make me break down these vegetables by myself?
For starters, peel the outer layer off of all these onions.
After that, remove the strings from the string beans.
You did not do a single thing wrong!
Grandpa made a strong declaration like that,
Sis, what should I have done?
I could not say something to Hina like Grandpa did.
Why did not you tell me this before?
Why could not you have handled it more smoothly?
I think of the safety of a kid in my own family before a kid in another family.
Hina is suffering plenty as it is.
So if we ask her, Why did you do that?
on top of everything else, she will feel lost.
More than anything, should not we praise Hina for her courage
and sense of justice for standing by her friend, even though she knew
it might make her the next target?
I have been the surrogate mom for Hina and Momo.
I did not know anything at 19.
But Mom was counting on me.
So I tried as hard as I could.
Think about the people who are around you, too.
I have been pushing ham-fisted advice on her.
But when push came to shove, this is what happens.
I thought, I do not care about justice.
I just wanted her to run away.
Even though Hina was hanging in there for the sake of her friend,
No one wants a family member to go through a painful experience.
After all, the one who is been watching over Hina the most...
I have been alone ever since I was a little kid.
But the thought of someone extending a helping hand was so terrifying.
I could not ask for anyone's help.
But that day, even though Hina said she was scared,
she was just as certain that she had no regrets and did not do anything wrong.
It is like she was trying to convince herself.
At the time, I realized that she had saved me.
So you, who raised Hina to be a girl with so much courage,
you are my savior too, Akari.
Is curry all right for dinner?
I am sure they will come home hungry.
And I rode on a panda!
You need to take your shoes off!
Do not you visit too much?
Do not take me seriously, idiot!
You are making me look like a bad guy here!
I won it at a ball toss game.
I thought it looked like you.
I thought it might be childish, but...
Kiriyama came to have instructional matches with us.
Kiriyama, are you sure that is all you want?
Can you tell me about your school?
I have been waiting for you to become passionate!
I will accompany you until the very end!
